title: worlds rewards
body: I wanted to buy the pumpkin orb that gives you a skin from a certain lane but then the k/da rewards came out. I dont really want that orb and im wondering if i have to get it or if they will bring some other orbs back that i can chose from

replies.body:
The original worlds content (with the Golden Championship chromas will be returning, but not the Tales from the Rift content.

>**Worlds:** September 28, 2018 at 1:00 a.m. AEST – October 25, 2018 at 10:59 a.m. AEDT
>*Also returns November 17, 2018 at 2:00 a.m. AEDT – November 20, 2018 at 16:59 p.m. AEDT

>**Tales from the Rift:** October 25, 2018 at 11:00 a.m. AEDT – November 3, 2018 at 9:00 p.m. AEDT

https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-worlds-season-2018-event
